text: Inse kaho ke jo koi Jibrael se adawat (dushmani) rakhta ho, usey maloom hona chahiye ke Jibrael ne Allah hi ke izan se yeh Quran tumhare qalb par nazil kiya hai, jo pehle aayi hui kitabon ki tasdeeq o taeed karta hai aur iman laney walon ke liye hidayat aur kamiyabi ki basharat bankar aaya hai
